card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Hyperspatial Bolshack Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent’s creatures that has 3000 power or less. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Hyperspatial Shooting Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Purification Trap
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You may choose one or more cards from your opponent's graveyard. If you do, your opponent adds those cards to their deck and shuffles it.

card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Explosive Dash! Masashi, Crimson Sabre
card.text: ■ This creature can't be destroyed. ■ Hunting ■ Triple Breaker ■ Link Release

card.name: Silver Scoop
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Immortal Boost, Crimson Lord
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature can't be destroyed. ■ When this creature loses a battle, return it to your hyperspatial zone.

card.name: Immortal Boost, Crimson Lord
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature can't be destroyed. ■ When this creature loses a battle, return it to your hyperspatial zone.

card.name: Bishamon Kid
card.text: ■ Psychic Link—Step#Step 1 (Start of Turn step) ■ Hunting

card.name: Bishamon Kid
card.text: ■ Psychic Link—Step#Step 1 (Start of Turn step) ■ Hunting

card.name: Yattare Pippi
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Your Hunters may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.
